files.description: A resolvable path to a writeable directory for file output.  The directory must exist and must be writeable.

request_timeout.description: Maximum number of seconds to wait for each request before giving up.

suites_to_ignore.description: A list of suite filenames that will be ignored by run_suite() when this configuration is used.  This allows you to write a suite called live_only.yml that can be skipped by your config.dev.yml file.

extras.description: Used for arbitrary configuration as determined by end user.  Use config_get() to access.
